name: Ace wo Nerae!
overview: It's a tennis videogame adapted from the Manga and Anime of the same name. This is one of the first games the used effects from the Mode 7 technology, simulating third-dimensional tennis arena. During 2003 and 2004 a ROM-hacking group named "RPGOne" translated the game to english and renamed it as "Aim For The Ace! ACE TENNIS".
